name: Aliens [PROTOTYPE]
description:
This is a prototype of a game I am currently working on. Its the farthest I've ever gotten with a game before so take that into consideration.

INFO:
I decided to turn the classic alien defense game on its head. You play as an invading alien spacecraft intent on destroying a peaceful city. Each time you play, the city is procedurally generated.

TODO:

Add lakes and trees.

Scale buildings upwards toward the most densely populated point, in effect creating a "downtown"
